subdisciplines.name: Cognitive Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of mental processes, such as perception, attention, language, memory and thinking.

subdisciplines.name: Neuroethology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the neural basis of animal behavior and perception.

subdisciplines.name: Neuroimaging
subdisciplines.description: The use of various techniques to either directly or indirectly image the structure, function, or pharmacology of the brain.
